attributes.action: Recommend to parliament that Great Britain should leave the European Union
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I simply want my country to go back to governing itself rather than being governed by officials in Brussels.As the European elections in our country conclusively show there is very little interest in our nation belonging to the European Union.I have no quarrel with the individual nations of Europe but I do with the union of those nations.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Recommend to parliament that Great Britain should leave the European Union"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14758.asp

Prime Minister's Office
